item.title: 1.3 Mermaid
item.description: sequenceDiagram Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob, how are you? alt is sick Bob->>Alice: Not so good :( else is well Bob->>Alice: Feeling fresh like a daisy end opt Extra response Bob->>Alice: Thanks for asking end flowchart LR id1[(Database)] id2([This is the text in the box]) id3{{This is the text in the box}} id1-->|connect|id2 id2-->|query|id3 id3-->id1 flowchart TB c1-->a2 subgraph one a1-->a2 end subgraph two b1-->b2 end subgraph three c1-->c2 end classDiagram Animal <|-- Duck Animal <|-- Fish Animal <|-- Zebra class Animal{ +int age +String gender +isMammal() +mate() } class Duck{ +String beakColor +swim() +quack() } class Fish{ -int sizeInFeet -canEat() } class Zebra{ +bool is_wild +run() } erDiagram CAR ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : allows CAR { string allowedDriver FK "
